mapper.select: SELECT d.DISTRICT_NAME AS DISTRICT_NAME, COUNT(*) AS POLICY_CNT FROM YOUTH_POLICY_DETAIL y JOIN districts d ON y.DISTRICT_CODE = d.DISTRICT_CODE GROUP BY d.DISTRICT_CODE, d.DISTRICT_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YOUTH_POLICY_DETAIL WHERE DISTRICT_CODE = #{districtCode} OR (#{districtCode} BETWEEN '01' AND '25' AND DISTRICT_CODE = '26')

SELECT Y.POLICY_CODE ,Y.POLICY_NAME,Y.PRD_RPTT_SECD ,Y.DISTRICT_CODE,D.DISTRICT_NAME,D.DISTRICT_LOGO_PATH FROM YOUTH_POLICY_DETAIL Y JOIN DISTRICTS D ON Y.DISTRICT_CODE = D.DISTRICT_CODE WHERE POLICY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' OR POLICY_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%'
